title: Men's Golf Polo Shirts Short Sleeve Striped Performance Moisture Wicking Dry Fit Golf Shirts for Men
description: PERFORMANCE MATERIAL: This mens golf shirts short sleeve made from Polyester Spandex, lightweight, moisture wicking, quick dry, UPF 30+, soft hand-feel, 4 way stretch, comfortable and breathable keep you cool.
SIZE: This mens polo shirts short sleeve based on US regular fit: S, M, L, XL, XXL, 3XL. Allowing for great mobility in any directions yet they still have a fitted look.
OCCASION: Our sport polo shirts for men dry fit, perfect for golf, tennis and other outdoor sport activities, also for casual everyday. A great gift for families, friends or boyfriends!
STYLE FEATURE: This golf polo for men use allover print stretch fabric with easy care and keep good shape, well-made stitching.

WARM TIPS: Our polyester men polo shirts The model is 5'11"height, 172lbs wearing a size Medium for reference. Please refer to the size chart in product image or description before you order it. Click our store on top to view more our mens polos.
